Name: Professionalism
Desc:
Shows true professionalism in handling various weapon. Increases Weapon Variation effects and attack skills have a chance of dealing additional damage.
This skill isn't affected by Cooldown Reset effects.
Required Skill: Lv. 10 Weapon Variation III or above

H.Old:
MP Cost: 500. Weapon Variation damage bonus is increased 2 times for 30 sec.
Creates an explosion that attacks up to 6 enemies at 255% damage 3 times when switching Weapon Arts or landing attacks.
Cooldown: 180 sec.
H.New:
MP Cost: 500. Weapon Variation Final Damage increase x2 times for 30 sec.
Successful attacks create an explosion that attacks up to 6 enemies at 255% Damage 3 times.
Cooldown: 180 sec.
